text:
I had the pleasure of working with Ronald, Wee, and Justin on my new home renovation, and I’m thrilled we chose them. Their workmanship is excellent, and they maintained steady progress despite our tight 2-month timeline for a full overhaul.

Ronald’s expertise shone through—he resolved on-site challenges with practical solutions. Wee’s meticulous eye for detail helped preempt potential issues, while Justin’s creative designs elevated the space.

What impressed me most was their commitment to balancing client needs, quality, and deadlines. A top-tier interior design firm that delivers on its promises. Highly recommend!

I recently had the pleasure of working with a professional interior designer, Wee and the Ritchie Creative Design team for my home renovation.

From the start of the project, I couldn't be happier with the results till the end of project partnership. Ritchie Creative Design and level of expertise, with the eye for detail transformed my space into a stunning haven. Wee and team partnered to explore possibilities, listened to various ideas and seamlessly integrated them into a cohesive and stylish design.

The process was smooth, and Wee’s  attention to every element, from colour schemes to cabinets’ choices, was impeccable.

I highly recommend hiring a professional interior designer, Wee and the Ritchie Creative Design Team to elevate your living space and bring your vision to life.

Worked with Wee on a project to build a storage wall with integrated pantry, altar and TV. The entire project was smooth and easy as they listened to our requirements and really implemented on them. Wee was meticulous and ensured that everything rans smoothly, even checking and spotting defects before we did and getting them rectified. 10/10 would recommend and will definitely come back to them for our future reno needs.

Ronald is a person that goes all the way out to assist me with the defects check, renovation and most importantly he is super efficient and very meticulously to meet my needs within the short period of moving to my new BTO.

Highly recommended to engage his service.

From a satisfied customer

Their staff is very nice and professional. Ms Wee Toh is super efficient, kind hearted and always go extra miles to make customers’ goal achieved. She knows her work very well including every single detail of renovation eg painting, carpentry work, and all other aspects that we encountered. She is the one you can trust and rely on. Their team keeps promise to complete work according to the tight work schedule (1w+) and within very reasonable budget.
